item.title: R to @saltnburnem: Same, and especially the ones that tell me they are ‚Äúdoing it for the community‚Äù while being for-profit and not paying speaker fees. I mean come on

item.title: R to @saltnburnem: I had one of those years ago. I‚Äôm pretty sure they‚Äôre all for-profit conferences, so they‚Äôre legit in the sense they exist and make money as entities. is the content good? ehhhh that‚Äôs a matter of opinion

item.title: RT by @torturecrush: Friends, as well-intentioned as you are, unless you've been organizing for years, your very best bet here is to join active networks and add your labor to them in whatever way is needed. We don't need rock stars, we need people who will show up every day and make copies & flyer.
item.dc:creator: @DifrancescoAlex
item.description: Friends, as well-intentioned as you are, unless you've been organizing for years, your very best bet here is to join active networks and add your labor to them in whatever way is needed. We don't need rock stars, we need people who will show up every day and make copies & flyer.

item.title:

item.title: I wish I could say ‚Äúhappy pride‚Äù this month but honestly there is nothing happy about it. the amount of anti-trans legislation and the overturning overturning of roe v wade - we need gay wrath way more than we need gay pride right now

item.title: R to @torturecrush: the writers got the origin of the word wrong when they said it was Algonquin though, to the best of my knowledge it was Potawatomi, Ojibwa, and Menominee (please let me know if this is incorrect)
item.dc:creator: @torturecrush
item.description: the writers got the origin of the word wrong when they said it was Algonquin though, to the best of my knowledge it was Potawatomi, Ojibwa, and Menominee (please let me know if this is incorrect)

item.title: I re-watched Wayne‚Äôs World recently to see how it aged and the scene where Alice Cooper explains the name Milwaukee is from indigenous groups that were displaced by American colonialism and then proceeds to monologue about this being stolen land was ahead of its time for movies
item.dc:creator: @torturecrush
item.description: I re-watched Wayne‚Äôs World recently to see how it aged and the scene where Alice Cooper explains the name Milwaukee is from indigenous groups that were displaced by American colonialism and then proceeds to monologue about this being stolen land was ahead of its time for movies
